verses.verse: Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H8085><s%> Hear, Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> which I speak <S%H1696><s%> in your ears <S%H241><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> that you may learn <S%H3925><s%> them, <S%H8104><s%> and observe to do them. <S%H6213><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us in Horeb. <S%H2722><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> didn't <S%H3772><s%> make this covenant <S%H1285><s%> with our fathers, <S%H1><s%> but with us, <S%H587><s%> even us, <S%H587><s%> who are all of us here alive <S%H2416><s%> this day. <S%H3117><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with you face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%> on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%>

(I stood <S%H5975><s%> between Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> and you at that time, <S%H6256><s%> to show <S%H5046><s%> you the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> for you were afraid <S%H3372><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> and didn't <S%H5927><s%> go up onto the mountain; <S%H2022><s%>) saying, <S%H559><s%>
"I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who brought you out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage. <S%H5650><s%>
"You shall have no other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> before me. <S%H6440><s%>

"You shall not make <S%H6213><s%> an engraved image <S%H6459><s%> for yourself, <S%H8544><s%> any likeness of what is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H4605><s%> or what is in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, <S%H4325><s%> or that is in the water under the earth: <S%H776><s%>

you shall not bow down <S%H7812><s%> yourself to them, <S%H5647><s%> nor serve them; <S%H3068><s%> for I, Yahweh, your God, <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> on the children, <S%H1121><s%> and on the third <S%H8029><s%> and on the fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation of those who hate me; <S%H8130><s%>
and showing <S%H6213><s%> loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> to thousands <S%H505><s%> of those who love <S%H157><s%> me and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments. <S%H4687><s%>

"You shall not take <S%H5375><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in vain: <S%H7723><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will not hold him guiltless <S%H5352><s%> who takes <S%H5375><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in vain. <S%H7723><s%>
"Observe <S%H8104><s%> the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> it holy, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> commanded you. <S%H6680><s%>
You shall labor <S%H5647><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all your work; <S%H4399><s%>

but the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is a Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> in which you shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any work, <S%H4399><s%> you, <S%H1121><s%> nor your son, nor your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> nor your male servant, <S%H5650><s%> nor your female servant, <S%H519><s%> nor your ox, <S%H7794><s%> nor your donkey, <S%H2543><s%> nor any of your livestock, <S%H929><s%> nor your stranger <S%H1616><s%> who is within your gates; <S%H8179><s%> that your male servant <S%H5650><s%> and your female servant <S%H519><s%> may rest as well as you. <S%H5117><s%>

You shall remember <S%H2142><s%> that you were a servant <S%H5650><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of there by a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and by an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm: <S%H2220><s%> therefore Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to keep <S%H6213><s%> the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

"Honor <S%H3513><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> and your mother, <S%H517><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you; <S%H3117><s%> that your days may be long, <S%H748><s%> and that it may go well <S%H3190><s%> with you, <S%H127><s%> in the land which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you. <S%H5414><s%>
"You shall not murder. <S%H7523><s%>
"Neither shall you commit adultery. <S%H5003><s%>
"Neither shall you steal. <S%H1589><s%>
"Neither shall you give <S%H6030><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> testimony <S%H5707><s%> against your neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>

"Neither shall you covet <S%H2530><s%> your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife; <S%H802><s%> neither shall you desire <S%H183><s%> your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> his field, <S%H7704><s%> or his male servant, <S%H5650><s%> or his female servant, <S%H519><s%> his ox, <S%H7794><s%> or his donkey, <S%H2543><s%> or anything that is your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s."

These words <S%H1697><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to all your assembly <S%H6951><s%> on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> of the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and of the thick darkness, <S%H6205><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> voice: <S%H6963><s%> and he added no more. <S%H3254><s%> He wrote <S%H3789><s%> them on two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> and gave them to me. <S%H5414><s%>

It happened, <S%H8085><s%> when you heard the voice <S%H6963><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the darkness, <S%H2822><s%> while the mountain <S%H2022><s%> was burning <S%H1197><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> that you came near <S%H7126><s%> to me, <S%H7218><s%> even all the heads of your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> and your elders; <S%H2205><s%>

and you said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh our God <S%H430><s%> has shown <S%H7200><s%> us his glory <S%H3519><s%> and his greatness, <S%H1433><s%> and we have heard <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire: <S%H784><s%> we have seen <S%H7200><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> does speak <S%H1696><s%> with man, <S%H120><s%> and he lives. <S%H2425><s%>

Now therefore why should we die? <S%H4191><s%> For this great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> will consume <S%H398><s%> us: <S%H8085><s%> if we hear the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> any more, <S%H3254><s%> then we shall die. <S%H4191><s%>

For who is there of all flesh, <S%H1320><s%> that has heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H430><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> as we have, <S%H2421><s%> and lived?

Go near, <S%H7126><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> shall say: <S%H559><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> us all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> shall tell <S%H1696><s%> you; <S%H8085><s%> and we will hear it, <S%H6213><s%> and do it."

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your words, <S%H1697><s%> when you spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me; <S%H3068><s%> and Yahweh said <S%H1696><s%> to me, <S%H8085><s%> "I have heard the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the words <S%H1697><s%> of this people, <S%H5971><s%> which they have spoken <S%H1696><s%> to you: <S%H3190><s%> they have well said all that they have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

Oh that there were such <S%H2088><s%> a <S%H4310><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> in them, <S%H5414><s%> that they would fear <S%H3372><s%> me, <S%H8104><s%> and keep all my commandments <S%H4687><s%> always, <S%H3117><s%> that it might be well <S%H3190><s%> with them, <S%H1121><s%> and with their children forever! <S%H5769><s%>
"Go <S%H3212><s%> tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H7725><s%> Return to your tents. <S%H168><s%>

But as for you, <S%H5975><s%> stand here by me, <S%H5978><s%> and I will tell <S%H1696><s%> you all the commandment, <S%H4687><s%> and the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and the ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> which you shall teach <S%H3925><s%> them, <S%H6213><s%> that they may do them in the land <S%H776><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> them to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>"

You shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> therefore as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you: <S%H5493><s%> you shall not turn aside to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left. <S%H8040><s%>

You shall walk <S%H3212><s%> in all the way <S%H1870><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, <S%H2421><s%> that you may live, and that it may be well <S%H2895><s%> with you, <S%H748><s%> and that you may prolong your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which you shall possess. <S%H3423><s%>
